1383580.name: Mechone
1383580.description:
This is. a generic arcade space shooter like the ones in the old times turned into 3D arcade. it has all the nostalogic space ship and bosses and a twist of characterization that comes as aliens fighting aliens in strange planets. you may find it good to play and enjoy the space shooter as it is a 3D version of the 8 bit shooter game.

left CNTRL to fire Left Alt to Bomb

this game hasnt been playtested but shouldnt run into any bug. may it arise report on the hub.

this game is about biomechanical creatures. they all have occupied in the planets of the knor solar system. there is a anamoly created by the host mainframe which does not follow order. he becomes a rouge soldier.
1383580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
